description: Returns the status of the resource policy associated with an Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID for the account that owns the specified Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Object Lambda Access Point.

nested_items.name: PolicyStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this access point policy is public. For more information about how Amazon S3 evaluates policies to determine whether they are public, see The Meaning of 'Public' in the Amazon S3 User Guide.
